name: Christian Matrimony - Marriage App for Christians
description: This is an all new app for Christians seeking their perfect life partner. Be it Protestant or Catholic or someone with a Born-again experience, we understand your preferences when it comes to marriage.   Thousands of Christian brides and grooms, from all over the world, have come together by using our service. Your partner search will reach out globally and locally now with profiles from all over. We list potential Christian matches for you from different parts of India and from all over the world, while not forgetting the denomination and division you desire.   Christian Matrimony App Features :  Free Registration Safe and Secure APP. 100% privacy guaranteed Find your life partner at your convenience User Friendly Interface and Features for easy partner search  Get instant notifications when a partner communicates  Express your interest to shortlisted prospective matches Shortlist and save potential matches Know who viewed & shortlisted your profile  Search from 1000s of NRI profiles across the globe Indias most trusted Christian Matrimony services App from Matrimony.com Limited  Find your partner from our other Regional Apps from Matrimony.com, Tamil Matrimony, Kerala Matrimony, Urdu Matrimony, Punjabi Matrimony, Hindi Matrimony, Bengali Matrimony, Gujarati Matrimony, Kannada Matrimony, Marathi Matrimony, Marwadi Matrimony, Oriya Matrimony, Telugu Matrimony, Assamese Matrimony, Parsi Matrimony and Sindhi Matrimony.  Christian Matrimony has registered members from various Denomination such as Adventist, Anglican / Episcopal, Apostolic, Assyrian, Assembly of God (AG), Baptist, Born Again, Brethren, Calvinist, Catholic, Church of God, Church of South India (CSI), Church of North India, Church of Christ, Congregational, Evangelical, Jacobite, Jehovahs Witnesses, Latin Catholic, Latter day saints, Lutheran, Malankara, Marthoma, Melkite, Mennonite, Methodist, Moravian, Orthodox, Pentecostal, Protestant, Presbyterian, Seventh-day Adventist, Seventh-day Adventist, Syro Malabar and Syrian Catholic   Globally, we are the preferred NRI Matrimonial Service provider for aspiring Brides and Grooms to find their perfect partner, especially for NRI communities spread over USA, Canada, Middle East, Bahrain, Kuwait, Oman,Qatar, Saudi Arabia, Australia, Singapore, Malaysia, Srilanka, United Kingdom, London, France, Germany, New Zealand and others globally.  Profiles are registered from cities across the country and globe such as Bangalore, Chennai, Hyderabad, Mumbai, New Delhi, Kolkata, Abu Dhabi, Dubai, Vishakapatnam, Goa, Thiruvananthapuram, Coimbatore, Madurai, Ernakulam, Mysore, Kottayam, Kanyakumari, Salem, Thane, Kozhikode, Tiruchirappalli, Thrissur, Guntur, Wayanad and many more.  ChristianMatrimony.com is a part of CommunityMatrimony.com from Matrimony.com - An Exclusive Community based Matrimony Service, we provide Exclusive Apps through our 40Plus Matrimony, Divorcee Matrimony, Manglik Matrimony, Any Caste Matrimony, Ability Matrimony and Defence Matrimony.  We truly respect your privacy at all times, so be assured, we are a 100% secure site for shaadi.  Members who register with us include Tamil Christians, Kerala Christians, Bengali Christians, Kannada Christians, Gujarati Christians, Telugu Christians, Marathi Christians and more.   ChristianMatrimony is a part of and is pioneered by CommunityMatrimony - an exclusive community oriented service for shaadi. Thousands of people from several Indian communities have found their perfect life partner here.  The ChristianMatrimony app is not just easy, its light too. We can do a lot with just a little space on your phone.  So, what are you waiting for? Download the ChristianMatrimony App Now and find your significant someone of love! Register FREE!
